sentences.english: Perhaps Fantine was within that shadow.
sentences.chinese: 芳汀也許就在迷濛的暮色中。

sentences.english: The light of the setting sun suffused the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 落日餘暉離開了峯頂，谷內暮色蒼茫。

sentences.english: Her eyes moved gradually out into the velvet dusk .
sentences.chinese: 她漸漸放眼去看那天鵝絨般的暮色。

sentences.english: In the boundless twilight, this herd of beautiful creatures are silhouetted by the rays of evening sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 暮色蒼茫中，這一羣美生靈被霞光勾勒出一片剪影。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower at sunset from the Sacre-Coeur Basilica.
sentences.chinese: 在聖心大教堂上欣賞暮色中的埃菲爾鐵塔。

sentences.english: We listened to a rich voice which rolled out into the dusk.
sentences.chinese: 我們靜聽暮色蒼茫中響起的一個圓潤洪亮的聲音。

sentences.english: Velvet black shadows emphasize their brilliance, while the depths of the canyon are flooded by an ocean of vermilion dusk.
sentences.chinese: 而大峽谷的深處正沐浴在一派硃紅的暮色蒼茫中。

sentences.english: When it gets dark in the evening, I have also seen her there quietly.
sentences.chinese: 暮色四合，天暗黑，我也曾遇過她無聲無息的身影。

sentences.english: The twilight died into the dark.
Lo the evening has come down upon the shore and in the fading light the seabirds come flying to their nests.
sentences.chinese: 看吧，暮色已經籠罩海岸，蒼茫裏海鳥已羣飛歸巢。
暮色中的一畦畦西紅柿。

sentences.english: Silvery -blue Regulus may look pinkish in the twilight.
sentences.chinese: 銀藍色的軒轅十四在暮色裏有一點點淺桃色。

sentences.english: Leaning into the afternoons I cast mky sad nets towards your oceanic eyes.
sentences.chinese: 倚身暮色裏，我朝悄海洋般的雙眼，投擲我哀傷的網。

sentences.english: Twilight descends in new Hampshire as an old man climbs onto his soapbox.
sentences.chinese: 暮色降臨在新罕布什爾州的一個老頭到他肥皂盒攀升。

sentences.english: Creekside Park cable cars (gondolas) passing the Emirates Towers at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 暮色中的河畔公園以及正經過阿聯酋大廈的纜車。

sentences.english: The land reposes in the dusk.

definition: night scene/the dim light of night
the sun sets in the west (idiom)
